sentences.en: Also, the force of your exhale should be proportionate to your effort.
sentences.cn: 另外, 你呼气的力度要与你做功的程度成正比.

sentences.en: His face was large and his hands and his feet also. And his girth was proportionate.
sentences.cn: 他的脸盘很大,手和脚也很大, 还有他的腰也很粗.

sentences.en: I think the penalty is proportionate to what he has done.
sentences.cn: 我认为这个处罚和他所做的是相称的.

sentences.en: In other words, its appeal is proportionate to how many other market players use it.
sentences.cn: 换句话说, 它的吸引力是与有多少其他市场的参与者使用它成正比的.

sentences.en: Please circle a score for each item proportionate to your child's performance in that item.
sentences.cn: 请圈出贵子弟在以上十个项目的表现的分数.

sentences.en: Reported volumes do not include Suncor's proportionate production share from the Syncrude joint venture.
sentences.cn: 报告的数量不包括森科尔的从辛克鲁德合资生产中的份额比例.

sentences.en: Republics will have voting rights proportionate to the size of their economies.
sentences.cn: 各共和国将拥有与其经济规模成比例的选举权。

sentences.en: Risk is always proportionate to reward.
sentences.cn: 风险总是与回报成正比.

sentences.en: Teachers economic income and job satisfaction generally proportionate. 7.
sentences.cn: 教师的经济收入和工作满意度大致成正比.

sentences.en: The cost of the ticket is proportionate to the distance you travel.
sentences.cn: 票价和旅行的距离是成比例的.

sentences.en: The extra field cultivated meant a proportionate increase in work.
sentences.cn: 额外开发土地意味着工作量相应增加。

sentences.en: The number of accidents is proportionate to the increased volume of traffic.
sentences.cn: 交通事故的数字与交通量的增长成正比。

sentences.en: The only way to create meaningful and proportionate regulations is to involve the industry.
sentences.cn: 唯一的办法就是制订出对行业有意义的而且适当的规定.

sentences.en: The price increases are proportionate to the increases in the costs of production.
sentences.cn: 价格的上涨与生产成本的增加成比例.

sentences.en: Vigilance and a proportionate response are required of leaders.
sentences.cn: 这要求企业领导者保持警惕,并依据情况做出正确的回应.

sentences.en: Wages will rise at a rate proportionate to the amount of work you do.
sentences.cn: 工资将与你所做的工作量成比例增加.

words.tran_cn: 成比例的；相称的；均衡的
比例的，成比例的；相称的，均衡的
成比例地；相称地，适当地
成比例的；相称的；适当的

trans.tran_cn: 成比例的，相称的，适当的
